verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was past, <S%G1230><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mother of James, <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Salome, <S%G4539><s%> had bought <S%G59><s%> sweet spices, <S%G759><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might come <S%G2064><s%> and anoint <S%G218><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> very <S%G3029><s%> early in the morning <S%G4404><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G3391><s%> day of the <S%G3588><s%> week, <S%G4521><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> at the rising <S%G393><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sun. <S%G2246><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> shall roll us away <S%G617><s%> <S%G2254><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door <S%G2374><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher? <S%G3419><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they looked, <S%G308><s%> they saw <S%G2334><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> was rolled away: <S%G617><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> very <S%G4970><s%> great. <S%G3173><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> a young man <S%G3495><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> right side, <S%G1188><s%> clothed in <S%G4016><s%> a long white garment; <S%G4749><s%> <S%G3022><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were affrighted. <S%G1568><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Be not <S%G3361><s%> affrighted: <S%G1568><s%> Ye seek <S%G2212><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth, <S%G3479><s%> which was crucified: <S%G4717><s%> he is risen; <S%G1453><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here: <S%G5602><s%> behold <S%G2396><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> go your way, <S%G5217><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he goeth before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee: <S%G1056><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall ye see <S%G3700><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto you. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they went out <S%G1831><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and fled <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sepulcher; <S%G3419><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> trembled <S%G5156><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were amazed: <S%G1611><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they any thing <S%G3762><s%> to any <S%G3762><s%> man; for <S%G1063><s%> they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus was risen <S%G450><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the week, <S%G4521><s%> he appeared <S%G5316><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene, <S%G3094><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had cast <S%G1544><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And she <S%G1565><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> them that had been <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> as they mourned <S%G3996><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wept. <S%G2799><s%>

And they, <S%G2548><s%> when they had heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was alive, <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> had been seen <S%G2300><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> believed not. <S%G569><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> he appeared <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> form <S%G3444><s%> unto two <S%G1417><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> as they walked, <S%G4043><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country. <S%G68><s%>
And they <S%G2548><s%> went <S%G565><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> it unto the <S%G3588><s%> residue: <S%G3062><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> they them. <S%G1565><s%>

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> he appeared <S%G5319><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> eleven <S%G1733><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> sat at meat, <S%G345><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upbraided <S%G3679><s%> them with their <S%G846><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hardness of heart, <S%G4641><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> them which had seen <S%G2300><s%> him <S%G846><s%> after he was risen. <S%G1453><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> ye into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> creature. <S%G2937><s%>
He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is baptized <S%G907><s%> shall be saved; <S%G4982><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he that believeth not <S%G569><s%> shall be damned. <S%G2632><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> shall follow <S%G3877><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> that believe; <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> shall they cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils; <S%G1140><s%> they shall speak <S%G2980><s%> with new <S%G2537><s%> tongues; <S%G1100><s%>

They shall take up <S%G142><s%> serpents; <S%G3789><s%> and if <S%G2579><s%> they drink <S%G4095><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> deadly thing, <S%G2286><s%> it shall not <S%G3364><s%> hurt <S%G984><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> they shall lay <S%G2007><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sick, <S%G732><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they shall recover. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2573><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G3303><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> he was received up <S%G353><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> went forth, <S%G1831><s%> and preached <S%G2784><s%> every where, <S%G3837><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> working with <S%G4903><s%> them, and <S%G2532><s%> confirming <S%G950><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> following. <S%G1872><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
